text:
"Maine tera naam board pe likha ek chalk se". Tere jaise log rarely hote hai duniya mein. You are one of those whose mere existence puts a smile on everyone around you (those who are worth it anyway). Duniya tereko idealist bolegi. Mai bolunga tere mein spine hai. You are a beautiful personality and I know ki tu grow zaroor karega. Lekin apne un qualities ko kho mat dena jo tujhe special banate hai. Tu jaha bhi jayega, ek beacon of light banke rahega. Kuch log is baat se disagree karenge but tu unko safely maa chudane bol sakta hai. Kabhi low feel ho raha ho toh ye baatein yaad karna. 

In short " TU KUCH BHI KAR SAKTA HAI! YAYYY!!!!"

Aur haan duaaon mein yaad rakh lunga. (Brahman sala)
author: Suprateek  Das

text:
Ayy Lokiiii!!! Tu sirf achha dost nhi balki ek extraordinary insaan hai. Haan tu ye baat kabhi kabhi bhool jaata hai isiliye agla sentence all caps mein ayega. 

YOU ARE ONE OF THE ONLY REASONS I STILL HAVE FAITH IN HUMANITY.

Tere jaisa insaan kitaabo ke bahar mil sakta hai aisa mai nhi maanta thha. Tere jaisa sensitivity, depth aur strength maine kisi ke andar nhi dekha. Tere saath har conversation ke baad lagta hai zindagi mein thode aage badhe. Tere stories sunke realize hota hai abhi bhi kitna raasta baaki hai. Teri value jo naa samjhe vo insaan insaan nhi daanav hai. aage jaake kabhi ye baat bhool mat jana. Agar aas paas ki duniya mein lage andhera zyada ho raha ho toh yaad rakhna ki jitni bhi roshni hai, shayad sirf tere hi vajah se hai.
Wish you luck aur kabhi himmat mat harna. Aur khush rehna yaar
author: Suprateek  Das

text: Ayy Mech ka opener kholu lolu. Galiyaan kaafi nhi teri haramzadgi express karne ke liye. Lekin awesome toh tu hai. 3rd year antaragni tere alava mai nhi reh pata. Tere jaisa dedication aur honest kaam bahut kam log karte hai maan le. Agli baar roya to chappal maarenge.
author: Suprateek  Das

text: Ayyy Nana bhosdike! Sober or not, tu aas paas rahe toh kahi bhi maza aa jaye. Foyer ke andar ho ho ya bahar, tere se bada performer koi nhi. Chaapu Nana. Tu aya thha tabh bhi hero thha jaa raha hai abhi bhi hero hai. TU jaha bhi jayega hero banke rahega. Jai Nana!
author: Suprateek  Das

text: Dilo mein betabiyan leke chal rahe ho toh zinda ho tum. Betaab insaan agar koi dekha hai toh wo tum ho. Bina rhyme ke shayari likhna tumse achha koi nhi janta. Aur khud ko chutiya prove karke comedy karna tera special talent hai. Aise hi kabhi kahi problem ai toh bol dena "hug diya bhenchod". Dekhna saare problem door ho jayenge. Lekin haan. Dusro ka credit khud mat le lena. Nhi toh sab milke dhoondke gpl lenge teri.
author: Suprateek  Das
